name: CaveJumper (Brani_Dev)
description:
CaveJumper is a 2D platformer,

where difficulty is increasing ...

So in the First levels my Game will go easy on you...

But in the last ones it will be a really Hardcore...

be prepare to dying a lot!

Features : 

Double Jumps

10 levels 

Play Time 15-60min.

Timer and Death counter

currently waiting for Google Play to approve my game so you can play it on Android ;)
